job_details.Functieomschrijving: Met interesse voor data, innovatie en AI product implementatie zal je werken aan de realisatie van producten met Machine Learning, Deep Learning, OCR, Computer Vision, LLM's en meer. Ook Docker, Kubernetes, AI deployment pipelines en Generative AI zullen elementen van het werk zijn.
job_details.full_text:
Devops Engineer / ML-Engineer

Met interesse voor data, innovatie en AI product implementatie zal je werken aan de realisatie van producten met Machine Learning, Deep Learning, OCR, Computer Vision, LLM's en meer. Ook Docker, Kubernetes, AI deployment pipelines en Generative AI zullen elementen van het werk zijn.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes working with Machine Learning, Deep Learning, OCR, Computer Vision, and LLMs, with a strong focus on deployment pipelines, Docker, and Kubernetes. While LLMs are mentioned, the core responsibilities lean towards building and deploying ML models in production, aligning more closely with the 'ML Engineer' profile's emphasis on MLOps and productionizing models, rather than the GenAI Engineer's focus on advanced prompt engineering and fine-tuning of LLMs for user-facing applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Machine Learning, Deep Learning, OCR, Computer Vision, LLM's' directly refers to the creation and application of models.
job_tasks.phrase: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, OCR, Computer Vision, LLM's

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Docker, Kubernetes, AI deployment pipelines' are core components of MLOps and productionizing AI systems.
The phrase 'product implementatie' suggests the integration and deployment of AI models into products, which involves software development aspects.
The phrase 'Generative AI' refers to a type of modeling.
